name: Placeholder
desc: A widget that draws a box that represents where other widgets will one day be added.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color to draw the placeholder box.

fields.name: strokeWidth
fields.desc: The width of the lines in the placeholder box.

fields.name: fallbackWidth
fields.desc: The width to use when the placeholder is in a situation with an unbounded width.

fields.name: fallbackHeight
fields.desc: The height to use when the placeholder is in a situation with an unbounded height.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The [child] contained by the placeholder box.

nodes.name: Placeholder Fallback Properties
desc: When there are no width and height constraints in the area, the width and height of the placeholder component.
